Basic jQuery usages

Refresh on some basic jQuery methods and usages.

How to create element and text

createElement() = create an HTML element

createTextNode() = create a text node

appendChild() = appends a node as the last child of a node

insertBefore() = inert an element uefore a targeted element

childNodes() = returns a collection of a nodeâ€™s child nodes, as a NodeList object

Wrapping elements

wrap() = wraps each of the selected elements

wrapInner() = wraps the content of each selected element

append() vs appendTo()

$(target).append(content);
$(content).appendTo(target);

resize() method

Use resize() to detects and determines what to do at a specific page breakpoint
